NODE_PATH.description: Configure to allow PREPHub modules to share packages in a common node_modules directory. See Docker.template for our deployment configuration.

PREPHUB_FADECANDY_HOSTS.description: List of device hosts in JSON array format. Only required to override; devices are plug-and-play self-discovering

PREPHUB_FADECANDY_PORT.description: Port on which instances of Fadecandy will run

PREPHUB_LOCATION.description: Override geolocated address for weather data

PREPHUB_LOCKFILE_PATH.description: Directory in which to store the PREPHub mode lockfile

PREPHUB_LOG_PATH.description: Directory in which to store logs

PREPHUB_RESIN_AUTH_TOKEN.Description: Non-expiring Resin.io authorization token. Configure as an application environment variable from the Resin.io dashboard.

RESIN_DEVICE_UUID.Description: UUID of the current device for geolocation. Configured automatically by Resin.io.
